short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace the new Twitter logo with the old Twitter bird icon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Embrace nostalgia with the "Old Twitter Bird Extension"! This fun and humorous Chrome extension replaces the new Twitter "x" logo with the classic Twitter bird icon, taking you back to the good ol' days of Twitter. Enjoy a touch of vintage while browsing your tweets! Note: This extension is not affiliated with Twitter or its parent company."
